騥字的基本解释

騥
róu
多鬃的青黑色马。

騥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róu］
［《廣韻》耳由切，平尤，日。］
鬃多的青黑色马。

騥字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騥； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1441第44
【廣韻】耳由切【集韻】而由切，?音柔。【爾雅·釋畜】靑驪繁鬣騥。【註】繁鬣，兩被毛。或云美髦鬣。

騥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
騥字的起名意思

多鬃的青黑色马。

騥
Basic explanation of words
騥
róu
Blue-black horse with bristles.
騥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［róu］
["Guangyun" Ear Youqie, Ping You, Day. ]
A blue-black horse with a large mane.
騥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　騥; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1441 Page 44
[Guang Yun] The ear is cut by [Ji Yun], and the sound is soft. 【Erya·Shuhu】The sacred animals are multiplying. [Note] Fan hyena has two coats. Or Yunmei Manga.
